body: After 23 years, Myanmar's legislature opened its first session and elected its new leaders. The new officers are all members of the junta-backed party.
original_body: After 23 years, Myanmar's legislature opened its first session and elected its new leaders. The new officers are all members of the junta-backed party.
title: Myanmar: Leaders of the new Parliament

sentence: After 23 years, Myanmar's legislature opened its first session and elected its new leaders.
The new officers are all members of the junta-backed party.
